strapiJob.title: Housing Monitor
strapiJob.description:
2 Positions: one is Sat. 7a-8p and Sun 8a-8p and the other is Sat. 8p-8a and Sun 8p-8a both $11.00

You will be working in our Emergency Shelter with our Homeless Clients. This is considered an ESSENTIAL EMPLOYEE. You will be making a difference in the lives of individuals each and every day.

Summary: Accepts and processes residents staying in a housing facility overnight; monitors the activity of residents on an assigned shift ensuring safety, security and compliance to house rules; maintains accurate and complete records and logs containing pertinent information; ensures that the housing facility is maintained in a neat and proper order. Laundry and some cleaning duties. Cooks, prepares and serves meals. Picks up, sorts, and puts away food donations, oversees volunteers, sorts donations brought to shelter, handles emergency crisis situations, first point of contact for visitors and guests to shelter. Follows and initiates emergency procedures. Point of contact for emergency personal. Completes training assigned in order to help run an Emergency Shelter. Not all inclusive.
